title: Air quality monitoring at power plant in Aruba
summary: WEB Aruba NV, an electricity generation facility in the Caribbean, implemented continuous air quality monitoring using Aeroqual AQM 65 monitors to address worker health complaints from a neighboring container terminal. The monitors measured PM1, PM2.5, PM10, TSP, NO2, O3, SO2, CO, temperature, relative humidity, wind direction and speed, and rain.
